q_ch: 列出所有缝纫组的进度百分比。
q_en: List the progress percentage of all sewing groups
gt:
Sure! Let's take a look at the progress percentage of all the sewing groups. Here's a breakdown of their progress:

| Sewing Group       | Progress Percentage |
|--------------------|---------------------|
| Master Sewers      | 97.45%              |
| Skilled Sewers     | 97.22%              |
| Advanced Sewers    | 82.00%              |
| Premier Sewers     | 74.67%              |
| Elite Sewers       | 44.07%              |

It looks like the Master Sewers and Skilled Sewers are leading the way with impressive progress! Keep up the great work, everyone! 🎉🧵

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed, SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total completed quantity and planned quantity for each sewing task

steps.sql: SELECT id, name FROM working_group WHERE type = 'sew';
steps.description:
Calculate the progress percentage for each sewing group
Thought For each sewing group, calculate the progress percentage by dividing the total completed quantity by the total planned quantity and multiplying by 100 to get the percentage.

Step3: Retrieve the names of the sewing groups
